scripts.start: eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i src/_assets/css/tailwind.css -c src/_assets/css/tailwind.config.js -o dist/_assets/css/main.css --watch
scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i src/_assets/css/tailwind.css -c src/_assets/css/tailwind.config.js -o dist/_assets/css/main.cs --minify
